Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks.OffsetCallback

  • Packages that use OffsetCallback 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.data
    Contains all elements to configure the datasets of a chart instance (know as chart data at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels
    Contains all classes to activate the DataLabelsPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-datalabels.js ) for CHART.js.

    • Uses of OffsetCallback in org.pepstock.charba.client.data

      OffsetCallback<DatasetContext> PieDataset.getHoverOffsetCallback()

      Returns the offset callback, if set, otherwise null.
